title: Need a girl Flatmate REALLLYYY URGENT
content:
Hiii so PGs are absolutelyyy horrible and I need a roomie reall urgent so that i can get out of here ASAP pleaseee?

im in 3rd year of ACCA and im insanelyy cool (no, like really)  
please contact me

comments.body: people can we focus on my problem??
not blaming you, but reddit is mostly filled with dudes and a lot of creeps, so you're probably not going to get anything useful here. try asking on Facebook instead
